children.value: : The Open Mobile Alliance (OMA) offers a publications table with resources for approved, candidate, and historic Enabler Releases. Users can easily explore dedicated resources for each Enabler version, providing quick access to technical documentation and ensuring efficient navigation of OMA's Enabler repository.
: Input keywords associated with the Enabler Name to get a comprehensive breakdown of resources.
: This efficient search method will streamline your quest for information, providing a complete list of resources.
By following these steps, you can efficiently locate the OMA documentation you need, tailored to your specific requirements.

Unlock the Power of OMA's Enablers: With over 220 Enablers, each available in multiple release versions, OMA offers a vast range of possibilities. Explore this wealth of information using our two simple search methods:
: Find a specific document quickly by entering its title, keyword, or document number.
: Explore all documents related to a particular project or Enabler by selecting the relevant category.
These methods make it easy to find the technical specifications you need.
